explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of machine learning techniques, specifically Boosting and Support Vector Machines, in the Classification-Monte Carlo algorithm for pricing options.
explanations.classification: The paper discusses the Classification-Monte Carlo algorithm, which relies on classification techniques from the machine learning domain.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper evaluates the performance of Support Vector Machines (SVM) as one of the machine learning techniques used in the algorithm.
explanations.SVM: SVM is explicitly mentioned as one of the machine learning techniques evaluated in the paper.
